attributes.action: Put the knife angel on the 4th plinth in London.
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan dismissed the knife angel from coming to London

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It's the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The Fourth Plinth Project is run by the London Assembly as an arts project. You can find out more here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/what-we-do/arts-and-culture/art-and-design/fourth-plinth
